AT.name: Mario Power Tennis™
AT.description: Hast du das Zeug, um dich mit den Tennisprofis des Mario™-Universums zu messen? Als junger Neuling, der sich gerade erst an der Königlichen Tennis-Akademie angemeldet hat, kannst du deinen Charakter trainieren und deine Werte verbessern, bevor du es mit den Besten des Pilz-Königreichs aufnimmst! Mit seiner Mischung aus Rollenspiel und Sportsimulation ermöglicht Mario Power Tennis™ es dir, deinen Charakter im Story-Modus an die Spitze zu führen und Powerbälle im Powerball-Training zu meistern. Erlebe eine große Auswahl an Techniken mit einer schnellen und einfachen Steuerung und halte die Augen offen, dann wirst du viele bekannte Gesichter sehen!

AU.name: Mario Power Tennis™
AU.description: Do you have the skills to go head-to-head with the tennis pros of the Mario™ universe? As a young rookie enrolled in the Royal Tennis Academy, train your character and build up their stats before you take on the Mushroom Kingdom’s best! Part role-playing game, part sports simulation, Mario Power Tennis™ lets you take your character to the top in Power Tour Mode and master Power Shots in Power Training Mode. Enjoy the wide repertoire of moves with quick and simple controls, and look out for many familiar faces!

BG.name: Mario Power Tennis™
BG.description: Do you have the skills to go head-to-head with the tennis pros of the Mario™ universe? As a young rookie enrolled in the Royal Tennis Academy, train your character and build up their stats before you take on the Mushroom Kingdom’s best! BE.name: Mario Power Tennis™
BE.description: Êtes-vous capable d'affronter les meilleurs joueurs de tennis de l'univers Mario™ ? Incarnez un jeune débutant fraîchement arrivé à l'Académie Royale de Tennis, entraînez-vous et améliorez vos statistiques avant de défier les plus grands champions du Royaume Champignon ! Dans Mario Power Tennis™, moitié jeu de rôles, moitié simulation sportive, frayez-vous une place jusqu'en haut du classement en mode Scénario et entraînez-vous à maîtriser les Super Frappes. Profitez de commandes simples et efficaces pour asséner un arsenal de coups à des adversaires aux visages si familiers !

ES.name: Mario Power Tennis™
ES.description: Demuestra que tienes madera de campeón enfrentándote a los tenistas profesionales del universo de Mario™. Métete en la piel de un novato de la academia de tenis, y entrena y mejora tus habilidades para convertirte en el número uno del Reino Champiñón. Mario Power Tennis™, un juego que combina rol y simulación deportiva, te permite llevar a tu personaje a la cima en el modo Historia y dominar los golpes especiales en el modo de entrenamiento. Disfruta del amplio repertorio de movimientos con controles rápidos y sencillos, ¡y estate atento para no perderte ni una de las muchas caras conocidas que irán apareciendo!

IT.name: Mario Power Tennis™
IT.description: Hai la stoffa per affrontare le stelle del tennis dell'universo di Mario™? Vesti i panni di una giovane promessa del tennis iscritta all'Accademia Reale di Tennis, allena il tuo personaggio e fai crescere le sue abilità prima di affrontare i campioni del Regno dei Funghi! Con Mario Power Tennis™, una miscela di gioco di ruolo e simulazione sportiva, puoi portare in vetta il tuo personaggio in modalità Storia o perfezionare i Super Colpi in palestra. Divertiti con le tante mosse dai comandi rapidi e intuitivi e guardati intorno... riconoscerai molti volti noti!

NL.name: Mario Power Tennis™
NL.description: Ben jij vaardig genoeg om de professionele tennisspelers uit het Mario™-universum te verslaan? Een jonge beginner heeft zich aangemeld bij de Royal Tennis Academy en het is aan jou om deze beginneling te trainen. Verbeter de statistieken en neem het op tegen het beste dat Mushroom Kingdom te bieden heeft! In Mario Power Tennis™, dat is opgebouwd uit RPG- en sportsimulatie-elementen, train je je Power Shots in de Power Shots-spelstand en ga je voor de toppositie in de Power Tour-stand. Geniet van een breed repertoire aan acties die snel en eenvoudig uit te voeren zijn, en houd je ogen open voor de vele bekende gezichten!

NZ.name: Mario Power Tennis™
NZ.description: Do you have the skills to go head-to-head with the tennis pros of the Mario™ universe? As a young rookie enrolled in the Royal Tennis Academy, train your character and build up their stats before you take on the Mushroom Kingdom’s best! Part role-playing game, part sports simulation, Mario Power Tennis™ lets you take your character to the top in Power Tour Mode and master Power Shots in Power Training Mode. Enjoy the wide repertoire of moves with quick and simple controls, and look out for many familiar faces!

PL.name: Mario Power Tennis™
PL.description: Do you have the skills to go head-to-head with the tennis pros of the Mario™ universe? As a young rookie enrolled in the Royal Tennis Academy, train your character and build up their stats before you take on the Mushroom Kingdom’s best! Part role-playing game, part sports simulation, Mario Power Tennis™ lets you take your character to the top in Power Tour Mode and master Power Shots in Power Training Mode. Enjoy the wide repertoire of moves with quick and simple controls, and look out for many familiar faces!

PT.name: Mario Power Tennis™
PT.description: Tens o que é preciso para desafiares os habilidosos jogadores de ténis do universo de Mario™? Como jovem principiante da Royal Tennis Academy, irás treinar o teu personagem e melhorar a sua classificação até enfrentares o campeão de Mushroom Kingdom! Com uma combinação perfeita entre RPG e simulação desportiva, Mario Power Tennis™ convida-te a levar o teu personagem até ao topo no modo Power Tour, e a dominar as Power Shots com o modo Power Training. Diverte-te com o vasto repertório de movimentos utilizando controlos simples e rápidos, e atenção às muitas caras conhecidas que vão aparecendo!

RU.name: Mario Power Tennis™
RU.description: Хотите сразиться в теннис с профессионалами из игровой вселенной Марио™? Запишитесь в Royal Tennis Academy (Королевскую академию тенниса), и ваш персонаж начнет обучение с самых азов. Достаточно отточив свои навыки, он выйдет на корт, чтобы побороться за звание чемпиона Грибного королевства! Mario Power Tennis™ — это смесь ролевой игры и спортивного симулятора. В режиме Power Tour Mode вы принимаете участие в теннисном турнире, а в режиме Power Training Mode можете отрабатывать мощные удары. В игре можно использовать множество приемов и ударов, при этом управление отличается удобством и легкостью. Беритесь за ракетку — и вперед, на корт, к старым знакомым!

SE.name: Mario Power Tennis™
SE.description: Do you have the skills to go head-to-head with the tennis pros of the Mario™ universe? As a young rookie enrolled in the Royal Tennis Academy, train your character and build up their stats before you take on the Mushroom Kingdom’s best!
